channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I Was Jailed for 18 Months Under the FACE Act. It’s Time to Repeal This Unconstitutional Law
item.description: The FACE Act is being used against Don Lemon but could be weaponized against pro-life activists like me again.
